price: (24) Say, "It is He who has multiplied you throughout the earth, and to Him you will be gathered."
arabic: قُلۡ هُوَ ٱلَّذِي ذَرَأَكُمۡ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَإِلَيۡهِ تُحۡشَرُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: qul huwa alladhī dhara-akum fī al-arḍi wa-ilayhi tuḥ'sharūna
